TenantSecurityUserPerm.name: TenantSecurityUserPerm

Action.description: The action taken regarding the user’s permission. The options are: Added Removed

ActionBy.description: This field is reserved for future use.

ActionDate.description: The date that the permission action was taken.

Context.description: The name of the profile or permission set assigned to the user.

ContextType.description: Indicates the method through which the permission was granted. The options are: Permission Set Profile

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique within your org.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted.

MetricsType.description: The type of metric that the assigned permission represents.

Name.description: The name of the metric for which data is being collected.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant where the user permission was applied.

TenantName.description: The name of the connected tenant where the user permission was applied.

UserLicense.description: The license assigned to the user.

TenantSecurityUserPerm.accessRules: This object can only be read and queried.
